articles.title: Splurge or save? Americans struggle as Trump tariffs hit economy - BBC.com
articles.description: Families in the US are trying to dodge higher prices from tariffs, as worries rise about the economy.
articles.content: A few days after Donald Trump won the US presidential election, Amber Walliser stocked up, spending $2,000 (£1,538) on appliances she believed would get more expensive as the White House started to p… [+4666 chars]
